name: A Past Unknown
description:
Natural Solutions appears, at first glance, to be nothing more than another pharmaceutical startup. Another entry on the list, one that no one has given a second look. It's just another small company that'll probably go under soon, after all.

A nameless man wakes up within its monolithic underbelly. They're facing a staffing problem - monsters from another world have invaded the labs and made everyone turn against one another. But the unnamed one isn't concerned with any of that. He needs to escape and find out who he is.

Discover his past. Decide his future.
